Content: Chinese President Xi Jinping met with Nigerien President Mahamadou Issoufou ahead of the 2018 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation. China and Niger are good friends with mutual respect and trust, and good partners of mutually beneficial and win-win cooperation. The two sides should enhance friendly exchanges, increase communication about governance and development experience, and continue to firmly support each other on issues of core interests and major concerns. China is willing to expand cooperation with Niger in the fields of medical services, infrastructure building, energy, and transport, and support the efforts of West African countries to boost connectivity.
